actions.name: Parting Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage. On a hit  the boggard may jump up to its Speed horizontally and half its Speed vertically without provoking opportunity attacks.

actions.name: Incite Frenzy (1/Day)
actions.desc: Each boggard and frog with a Bite attack within 60 feet may use its reaction to make a Bite attack.

actions.name: Earthshaking Croak (1/Day)
actions.desc: Each non-frog and non-boggard creature within 30 feet makes a DC 12 Constitution saving throw  taking 14 (4d6) thunder damage and falling prone on a failure  or taking half damage on a success.

actions.name: Summon Frog Guardians (1/Day)
actions.desc: The boggard magically summons two Medium frog guardians  which wriggle from the ground in an empty space within 30 feet. They follow the boggards orders and disappear after 1 minute. They have the statistics of boggards except they have Intelligence 2  have no spear attack  and can make a bite attack as part of their Vaulting Leap.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The boggard can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
special_abilities.desc: The boggard can communicate with frogs and toads.
